price: 73. And they have (other) benefits from them, and they get (milk) to drink. Will they not then be grateful?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
